caption.title: Biosafety risk management.
caption.p: (A) Personal protective equipment (PPE) used when receiving specimens. (B) Inner PPE (B1) and external PPE (B2) used when extracting RNA. (C) Air samples were collected from every working room, including the biosafety level-3 laboratory (C1), equipment room (C2) and wastewater treatment room (C3). (D)The worksite (D1) and personal space in which to rest between shifts (D2) were completely sanitized using the DEMAND capsule suspension.
Click here for additional data file.
